item.title: Misconfigured Cloud Assets
item.description: Misconfigured Cloud Assets AWS Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) Is secure by default. Can be made public. Nslookup can help reveal region. AWS cli # list contents of bucket aws s3 ls s3://<bucketname>/ # download contents of bucket aws s3 sync s3://<bucketname>/ local-dir # s3 code injection aws s3 mv evil-script.html s3://<bucketname>/evil-script.html Tools: - cloud_enum # MOVE TO OWN TOOLS PAGE S3 domain hijacking Look for 404’s to *.s3.amazonaws.com. If a bucket name is not in use you can register it and load your content on the site.
